item.title: 交易日：特朗普抨击鲍威尔
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 美国法官确认红树公司的报价为 Citgo 母公司股票拍卖的起拍价
item.description: 根据一份法庭文件，美国联邦法官周一确认 Contrarian Funds 的关联公司 Red Tree Investments 提出的 37 亿美元报价为委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司股份拍卖的起拍价，用于支付债权人和债券持有人。【原文：A U.S. federal judge on Monday confirmed a $3.7 billion offer by Contrarian Funds' affiliate Red Tree Investments as the starting bid in an auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum to pay creditors and bondholders, according to a court filing.】

item.title: 文件显示，2024 年 UnitedHealth 在高管安全方面的支出为 170 万美元
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）周一披露，该医疗集团在 2024 年花费近 170 万美元为其高层管理人员提供安保服务，而在此之前几个月，该集团的高级管理人员布莱恩-汤普森（Brian Thompson）于 12 月在曼哈顿一家酒店外遭枪击身亡。【原文：UnitedHealth Group spent nearly $1.7 million on security for its top executives in 2024, the healthcare conglomerate disclosed on Monday, months after the fatal shooting of senior executive Brian Thompson outside a Manhattan hotel in December.】

item.title: 美国商务部敲定东南亚太阳能产品关税税率
item.description: 美国贸易官员敲定了对来自东南亚的太阳能电池和电池板征收的关税水平，这是结束美国制造商指控其海外竞争对手以不公平的廉价商品充斥市场而提起的长达一年之久的贸易诉讼的关键一步。【原文：U.S. trade officials finalized tariff levels on solar cells and panels from Southeast Asia, a key step toward wrapping up a year-old trade case brought by American manufacturers that accuse their overseas rivals of flooding the market with unfairly cheap goods.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，天职与莫斯-亚当斯将以 70 亿美元的交易合并
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，天职（Baker Tilly）会计师事务所和莫斯亚当斯（Moss Adams）会计师事务所同意以 70 亿美元的价格进行合并，这将使其成为部分股权由私募股权投资者拥有的行业中最大的事务所之一。【原文：Accounting firms Baker Tilly and Moss Adams have agreed to merge in a $7 billion deal, making it one of the largest firms in an industry that is partly owned by private equity investors the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉就俄亥俄州车祸中突然加速的过失致死诉讼达成和解
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的电动汽车公司特斯拉（Tesla）已同意就一名男子的遗产提出的过失致死诉讼达成和解，该男子于 2021 年在俄亥俄州代顿市附近驾驶特斯拉汽车时发生车祸并起火身亡。【原文：Elon Musk’s electric vehicle company Tesla has agreed to settle a wrongful death lawsuit filed by the estate of a man who was killed in 2021 after his Tesla crashed and caught fire near Dayton, Ohio.】

item.title: 日经亚洲》报道：丰田与戴姆勒接近合并卡车部门
item.description: 据《日经亚洲》周二报道，丰田汽车公司旗下的日野汽车公司（Hino Motors）和德国戴姆勒卡车公司（Daimler Truck）旗下的三菱扶桑卡车和客车公司（Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus）正着手敲定合并协议。【原文：Toyota Motor unit Hino Motors and Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus, a subsidiary of Germany's Daimler Truck , are moving to finalize a merger agreement, Nikkei Asia reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 电子邮件称，美国银行业监管机构计划裁员 20
item.description: 美国一家顶级银行监管机构周一告诉员工，该机构计划裁员约 20%，作为特朗普政府裁减联邦工作人员的一部分。【原文：A top U.S. bank regulator told staff on Monday that it plans to cut its workforce by roughly 20% as part of the Trump administration's broader efforts to cull the federal workforce.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局将在 9 月前部署新的飞行员信息数据库系统
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）周一表示，在一系列故障引发安全担忧之后，该局计划在 9 月份之前部署一个新的飞行员信息数据库。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said Monday it plans to deploy a new pilot messaging database by September after a series of outages have raised safety concerns.】

item.title: Shopify 必须在美国面对数据隐私诉讼
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周一恢复了针对 Shopify 提出的数据隐私集体诉讼，这一决定可能使美国法院更容易对基于互联网的平台行使管辖权。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Monday revived a proposed data privacy class action against Shopify , in a decision that could make it easier for American courts to assert jurisdiction over internet-based platforms.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击鲍威尔，美股延续跌势，标普 500 指数下跌 3
item.description: 周一，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普加倍攻击美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔，加剧了市场对美联储自主权的担忧，华尔街主要股指均跌至一周多来的低点。【原文：Wall Street's main indexes each slid to more than one-week lows on Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump doubled down on attacks against Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, amplifying concerns about the central bank's autonomy and rattling markets.】

item.title: 联邦贸易委员会指控优步误导用户
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周一起诉优步科技公司（Uber Technologies），指控该公司在一些用户不知情的情况下注册了 Uber One 用户，并对该服务进行了欺骗性宣传。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Monday sued Uber Technologies , accusing it of signing up some Uber One subscribers without their knowledge and making deceptive claims about the service.】

item.title: 对冲基金在财报发布前将 "Mag Seven "下调至两年新低
item.description: 路透社看到的一份摩根士丹利给客户的说明显示，全球对冲基金上周抛售了所谓的 "华丽七巨头 "股票，使其在这些股票盈利前的持仓量降至两年来的最低点。【原文：Global hedge funds last week dumped the so-called Magnificent Seven megacap stocks, bringing their exposure to the group to a two-year low just ahead of their earnings, according to a Morgan Stanley note to clients seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 纽约联储任命 Anna Nordstrom 为市场部主管
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一表示，已任命 Anna Nordstrom 为市场部主管，立即生效。【原文：The Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Monday that it has appointed Anna Nordstrom as the head of the markets group, effective immediately.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：特朗普将会见沃尔玛、家得宝等零售商，讨论关税影响
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将与沃尔玛、家得宝、劳氏和塔吉特等大型零售商会面，讨论全面关税对其业务的影响。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is set to meet with major retailers, including Walmart , Home Depot , Lowe’s and Target , to discuss the impact of sweeping tariffs on their businesses, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 随着许可证到期的临近，壳牌将完成委内瑞拉天然气田的勘测工作
item.description: 与筹备工作关系密切的消息人士称，石油和天然气集团壳牌计划在美国设定的 5 月最后期限之前完成委内瑞拉海上龙气田的海洋勘测，该期限是关闭该国所有与能源项目有关的许可证。【原文：Oil and gas group Shell plans to complete a marine survey at Venezuela's offshore Dragon gas field before a U.S.-set May deadline to wind down all licenses related to energy projects in the country, sources close to the preparations said.】

item.title: 达美航空公司客机在奥兰多引擎起火，被迫撤离
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）称，达美航空公司一架载有近 300 名乘客的飞机周一在佛罗里达州奥兰多国际机场从登机口推回时引擎起火，迫使乘客使用滑梯撤离。【原文：A Delta Air Lines plane carrying nearly 300 passengers suffered an engine fire after pushing back from the gate at Orlando International Airport in Florida on Monday, forcing the passengers to evacuate using slides, the Federal Aviation Administration said.】

item.title: 美国司法部称，沃尔格林公司以 3 亿美元的价格就填写无效阿片类药物处方的指控达成和解
item.description: 美国司法部周一表示，沃尔格林博姿联盟（Walgreens Boots Alliance）及其子公司已同意支付 3 亿美元，以了结美国对该连锁药店非法开具数百万张阿片类药物和其他管制药物无效处方的指控。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance and its subsidiaries have agreed to pay $300 million to settle U.S. allegations that the pharmacy chain illegally filled millions of invalid prescriptions for opioids and other controlled substances, the U.S. Justice Department said on Monday.】

item.title: Reddit 出现故障，影响全球数千名用户，现已恢复运行
item.description: 据 Downdetector.com 网站报道，社交媒体平台 Reddit 在全球数千名用户于周一遭遇故障后已恢复正常。【原文：Social media platform Reddit was restored after thousands of users worldwide experienced outages on Monday, according to Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 纽约联储发现美国人降低了对新工作的工资预期
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的一项调查显示，3 月份美国人对劳动力市场的看法有所恶化，因为受访者大幅削减了他们认为能让他们接受新工作的薪资水平。【原文：Americans' view on labor markets soured in March as respondents to a Federal Reserve Bank of New York survey sharply trimmed back the payrate they said would get them to take a new job.】

item.title: GameStop 首席执行官必须面对 Bed Bath & Beyond 的诉讼
item.description: GameStop 的亿万富翁首席执行官 Ryan Cohen 必须面对曾被称为 Bed Bath & Beyond 的公司提起的诉讼，以收回在这家家居用品零售商破产前交易其股票所获得的 4720 万美元利润。【原文：Ryan Cohen, the billionaire chief executive of GameStop , must face a lawsuit by the company once known as Bed Bath & Beyond to recoup $47.2 million of profit from trading its stock before the home goods retailer went bankrupt.】

item.title: 美国 3 月领先指标在关税影响下大幅下降
item.description: 衡量美国未来经济活动的一项指标在 3 月份大幅下降，可能预示着今年的经济增长将在关税影响下变得乏力。【原文：A gauge of future U.S. economic activity fell sharply in March, potentially flagging tepid growth this year amid tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普警告称，除非美联储降息，否则经济将放缓
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，除非立即降息，否则美国经济可能会放缓，并再次批评美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔行动迟缓。【原文：The U.S. economy can slow down unless interest rates are lowered immediately, President Donald Trump said on Monday, repeating his criticism of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell as being slow.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回 CSX 恢复对诺福克南方公司反垄断诉讼的请求
item.description: 美国最高法院周一拒绝审理货运铁路巨头 CSX 提起的反垄断诉讼，该诉讼指控竞争对手诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）非法限制其进入弗吉尼亚州东海岸的一个重要码头，导致 CSX 损失了数亿美元的利润。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Monday to hear freight rail giant CSX's bid to revive its antitrust lawsuit accusing rival Norfolk Southern of illegally restricting access to a key East Coast terminal in Virginia, costing CSX hundreds of millions of dollars in lost profits.】

item.title: Chipotle 计划进军墨西哥市场，首家分店将于 2026 年开业
item.description: Chipotle Mexican Grill 公司周一表示，它将在墨西哥开设一家分店，并将于明年初开业，从而向国际市场扩张，首次为该地区的人们带来墨西哥卷饼和卷饼。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill is expanding internationally with a location in Mexico that is set to open early next year, it said on Monday, bringing its tacos and burritos to the people in the region for the first time.】

item.title: 雪佛龙宣布美国海湾巴利莫尔项目首次出油
item.description: 雪佛龙（Chevron）石油公司周一表示，该公司在美国墨西哥湾的一个项目已开始生产石油和天然气，这使该公司向今年将该海盆的产量提高 50%的目标又迈进了一步。【原文：Chevron has started oil and gas production from a project in the U.S. Gulf of Mexico, the oil major said on Monday, bringing the company a step closer toward its goal of growing production from the ocean basin by 50% this year.】

item.title: 预计俄罗斯央行将把关键利率维持在 21%：路透社民意调查
item.description: 参与路透社民意调查的 25 位分析师周一均预测，俄罗斯央行将在 4 月 25 日的董事会上将基准利率维持在 21% 不变，因为全球经济动荡加剧了人们对俄罗斯经济状况的担忧。【原文：The Russian central bank will keep its benchmark rate on hold at 21% at a board meeting on April 25, all 25 analysts who took part in a Reuters poll predicted on Monday, as global economic turbulence adds to concerns about the state of the Russian economy.】

item.title: 因关税引发的通胀担忧，美国债券基金遭遇第五周资金外流
item.description: 截至4月16日的一周里，美国债券基金面临着沉重的抛售压力，这凸显了人们对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税措施可能会加剧通胀并使经济陷入衰退的担忧。【原文：U.S. bond funds came under heavy selling pressure in the week to April 16, highlighting concerns that U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff measures could fuel inflation and push the economy into a recession.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：中国从美国私募股权投资中撤退
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周一报道，在全球最大的两个经济体之间贸易战不断升级的背景下，中国的国家支持基金正在撤出对总部设在美国的私人资本公司旗下基金的投资。【原文：China's state-backed funds are pulling back from investing in the funds of U.S.-headquartered private capital firms amid an escalating trade war between the world's two biggest economies, the Financial Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 投资者涌入欧洲股票基金，因关税问题逃离美国
item.description: 在截至4月16日的一周里，欧洲股票基金吸引了大量资金流入，而美国基金则面临大量资金流出，原因是投资者对美国贸易关税的担忧以及对美国经济实力的担忧不断加剧，从而继续转移资金。【原文：European equity funds drew massive inflows in the week ended April 16, while U.S. funds faced hefty outflows, as investors continued to shift capital on concerns over U.S. trade tariffs and mounting worries over the strength of the U.S. economy.】
